TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlBuilderAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ControlBuilderAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ControlBuilderAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: 指定用于在 ASP.NET 分析器内生成自定义控件的 类。 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此属性指定生成器<xref:System.Type>要用于创建自定义控件，如下面的代码中所示：
``` [ControlBuilderAttribute(typeof(ControlBuilderType))] ```
## Examples 下面的代码示例创建用于显示根据消息的自定义的选择列表`SelectedIndex`和`Message`值定义在运行时间。 下面的命令行用于生成可执行文件。
```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /r:System.Drawing.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/vb_MyControlBuilderAtt.dll ControlBuilderAtt.vb ```
```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/cs_MyControlBuilderAtt.dll ControlBuilderAtt.cs ```
[!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilderAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilderAttribute_2/CS/controlbuilderattribute_2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilderAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilderAttribute_2/VB/controlbuilderattribute_2.vb#1)]
下面的示例使用上面定义的自定义控件。 具体而言，它将分配`SelectedIndex`和`Message`在运行时，若要确定要呈现的消息的值。 请注意，中显示的值`Register`指令反映在上述命令行。
```vb <%@ Register TagPrefix="custom" Assembly="myControlBuilderAtt" Namespace="CustomControls" %> <h4>Using ControlBuilderAttribute Class<h4> <form runat="server"> <custom:MyVB_CustomParse SelectedIndex="3" runat=server> <customitem Message="Visual Basic version. Item One selected"/> <customitem Message="Visual Basic version. Item Two selected"/> <customitem Message="Visual Basic version. Item Three selected"/> <customitem Message="Visual Basic version. Item Four selected"/> </custom:MyVB_CustomParse> </form> ```
```csharp <%@ Register TagPrefix="custom" Assembly="myControlBuilderAtt" Namespace="CustomControls" %> <h4>Using ControlBuilderAttribute Class<h4> <form runat="server"> <custom:MyCS_CustomParse SelectedIndex="2" runat=server> <customitem Message="C# version. Item One selected"/> <customitem Message="C# version. Item Two selected"/> <customitem Message="C# version. Item Three selected"/> <customitem Message="C# version. Item Four selected"/> </custom:MyCS_CustomParse> </form> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type builderType) cil managed

Docs.summary: 为自定义控件指定控件生成器。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 要获取的控件的生成器类型与自定义控件的关联，请前面具有以下属性定义的自定义控件生成器类：
``` [ControlBuilderAttribute(typeof(controlbuildertype))] ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BuilderType As Type
public: property Type ^ BuilderType { Type ^ get(); };
